reviewText: This is an excellent set of DVD's for instructional purposes.  They are very well done... the explanation and direction, all clear and purposeful.  They make learning fun and comfortable.  Anyone wanting to learn massage techniques should buy these.  Great!

I'm In school now to be a massage therapist. I really liked this dvd. First off it was a nice CLEAR video. It was detailed,but not boring. I used some of the technigue in my class. The person I used it on loved it, and my instructor was impressed. However,I do wish that it came in a dvd case and for that it only gets 4 stars.

I've always wanted to learn how to make massage. I feel so big need to do something with my hands all the time. After thinking how to use constructively my hands and the energy they have, I decided that massage is the best option for me. These DVDs taught me how exactly to move my hands. For now I give massages to friends and family members only, but no wonder this to become my profession in future.

I am starting a new business with massages and I needed to refresh my knowledge of massage techniques. Those 4 DVDs were really helpful. Nice explanations about the massages and the proper way you should do them. If you are interested in massages these are the DVDs for you.
All of these videos I have watched on YouTube! Why did I pay money for this?
Effective and Easy to follow, home use only and partner totally unwinds and loving it. Exactly what I've been looking for.
ok
The information is relevant and once getting past some of the boredom, the helpful parts make easier. But really good material and would purchase again.
Very good

This is a great set to get especially if you are looking into becoming a massage therapist. After going through these DVDs you will quickly get a feel if this is the career path you want to go in. Great for couples to watch together and get free massages!
Delivered as promised but extremely disappointed that none of the dvds weren't able to play.
This is a product that I fell asleep to as the masseuse. My wife and I shut it off and sold it.

Great product for beginners of massaging.  Each disc is thorough in the area of content it titles.  Some clips are short and some are long and boring, however, the infomation is still relevant just have to get thru the boredom to see why its still helpful.  Glad I purchased it, it has improved my touch, senses, awareness of sensitivity, and reduced my roughness when giving massages.
I was really impressed by the material presented on the DVDs, it's very detailed, which is great since I don't know anything about massage! Well worth it!
Just as expected!
good to learn
As described, fast shipping and great product. Definately will buy from this seller A+...
Simple to follow.
just got a chance to start watching these and they are good. I am learning a lot as a beginner
bought for my wife so she can learn how do give massages in her line of work
These DVDs are great for anyone wanting to give a quality massage.  I am just starting as a massage therapist and these are very helpful.
Awful - CDs were scratched - sending them back.

These DVD's are horible don't waste your $. I sent them a letter of my disappointment and they sent me a new one and it was worse then the first. Nothing comes out on screen, or the picture gets distorted, or there's a song show on with people acting out the song. I ordered it in the summer because I signed up for massage school in Oct.
I was so excited to have it to help me study. So I'm out of whatever I paid.
Try someone elese or go to utube.
They got a star because I had to to post this. The only good thing is they sent me another one but that wasn't good either!!!
Helpful and a great reference tool in my business.
great way to learn and apply

My friend surprised me this Christmas by giving me this set of DVDs as a present. I enjoyed and found particularly useful the Full Body and the Back and Neck DVDs. My husband always wants a decent back and neck massage when he comes in from a hard day of work!
learn a lot
great
very cheaply made.  the teenage next door selling pirated movies.
found techniques too basic and boring for me
The DVDs are OK (decent instructional videos), but I'm pretty sure they are pirated from somewhere else. That bothers me.
very well done, easy to follow instructions, covers a lot of areas. walks you through each step and easy to go back through.
Very helpful and the instruction is very clear and at a good pace. The extra book was a bonus! Thank you very much!

Even though I am completely inexperienced in massage, this DVD set is really great for learning basic and advanced massage techniques. In just a few hours I was ready to give my boyfriend/guinea pig the massage of his lifetime. I am definitely recommending it to my friends. It did not go unappreciated.

Im beginning to become a skill-learning fiend lately. It might come from my uncle who buys these types of instructional videos all the time, but I figured why not? I snuck this one out of his house and it definitely does the job. Tested everything on my friends and girlfriend and they absolutely loved it. This is a great set if you're a beginner and all you know how to do is rub a shoulder. Im definitely becoming a fan of these mini-life-skills video sets now.
I Have been using massage to enhance intimacy form 20+ years, and although this series helped me introduce some new techniques, it fell short of my expectations of professionalism.
These CDs are extremely interesting to watch and the instructions are easy to follow.  I highly recommend this collection if one is interested it learning something about the benefits of massage.

The audio is awful, the can is one of the cheap ones you buy in bulk, the cover to the docs are the round stickers Kodak makes that you can print on, the menu and each seen is ciut off by a few seconds, the menu options are non responsive.

This other reviews are fake and this is a SCAM!!!!!!! Do not but this product!!!!

I am very pleased with my purchase. It's easy to follow along with and I would
recommend it to all my friends
for the price, these videos are great ... i'm beginner at home, not planning professional career as a massage therapist ... this is just the right info i was after
These instructional massage DVDs are clear and easy to follow. It's nice to follow along with the DVD while learning the techniques, instead of having to read a book.

This set has a lot of information that may be useful for some one who is has a limited knowledge about giving massage.  This is not a "high production" video made with studio lighting and background.  It is well worth its value for the information it provides.

This is a great collection of DVDs. Just what I was looking for. Each DVD begins by explaining the Do's and Don'ts of the massage, the benefit of each massage, and how to prepare your client for the massage (which oils to use, etc.). Each DVD is great at explaining the techniques and each technique is easy to follow. The massages given are very relaxing and are quite thorough. These DVDs are great for Christmas, Valentine's Day, Anniversary, Birthday gifts or just because. My husband and I like to use these for date night at home. Can't beat the price either.
I am glad o got this dvd great help yhe instruction on the video are really good you don't have to paused. ..perfect timing
Good introduction to massage.
These instructional dvds were very easy to follow. I give each dvd of this collection a 10.

Laughable!  Aside from the comic relief the DVDs were dated, poorly shot and not helpful - my daughter who's a professional therapist actually said some techniques suggested are actually dangerous - I'm not the expert but found some of the moves certainly very uncomfortable.  Don't waste your money.
Fast shipping A+ experience
The videos were very informative.
It was just ok.  Did not like the method on performing a full body massage.  Most therapist start a client with them on back.
extremely useful info
Great find

The 4 DVD s on massage is a great tool. All is other DVDS are good except for Indian head massage which I felt the therapist is not skilled enough . The techniques used looked superficial or not real .
great info
